name: ag-advisor-map
description: Agricultural advice application with interactive map

scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8157
scripts.backend:start: cd backend && poetry run python -m app.main
scripts.backend:format: cd backend && poetry run ruff format .
scripts.backend:lint: cd backend && poetry run ruff check .
scripts.backend:lint:fix: cd backend && poetry run ruff check --fix .
scripts.frontend:build: vue-tsc --project frontend/tsconfig.json --noEmit && vite build frontend --config frontend/vite.config.ts
scripts.frontend:test: echo "Frontend tests not yet configured. Run 'pnpm --filter ag-advisor-frontend test' if defined locally."
scripts.format: pnpm run frontend:format && pnpm run backend:format
scripts.test: pnpm run backend:test && pnpm run frontend:test

author: Michael, Brenan, Nathaniel, Eric, Dawson, Logan
